section.name: Commercial Support for OpenMeetings
section.p: There are few companies offering complex services for OpenMeetings, including code support, development, integration and bug fixing

ul.li: unipro.ru run by Maxim Solodovnik, Irina Arkhipets and other team
samoo.es provides support for the Sakai Plugin

section.p: Please write to om.unipro@gmail.com to get Unipro support

Cloud based hosting for OpenMeetings at om-hosting.com
See the Dedicated and Elastic Private Cloud Data-Sheets with details at:

ul.li: Dedicated Servers - 100, 200, and 400 concurrent users, see: Dedicated Server Data-Sheet
Elastic Private Cloud - 800, 1600 or more concurrent users, including clustering of KMS, auto-scaling and load-balancing see: Elastic Private Cloud Data-Sheet

section.p: To get in touch see Contact Us on their website
There are more companies offering installation, customization, hosting, conferencing and support services. You can add yourself to the wiki page.
Want to get listed here? Become a committer.
